roleset.name: create

example.name: transitive
example.text: The company has been manufacturing carpet since 1967.

example.name: passive
example.text: That means goods-1 could be manufactured *trace*-1 closer to customers, saving shipping costs, he said.

example.name: with benefactive
example.text: He said Tandy-1 ``has done a decent job'' *trace*-1 increasing sales by *trace*-1 manufacturing computers for others...

roleset.note: Source might not occur. Do not tag nominal usages: "Manufacturing causes pollution."

predicate.note: Frames file for 'manufacture' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry create-26.4, the only other verb that mentions this class is 'mint' but there must be others. Comparison to 'make' and 'create'.
